revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Vegetation | name = Tree stub | class = TreeStub | game = Strife | doomednum = 33 | convid = 269 }}[[Classes]]: TreeStub
{{desc}}In Strife1.wad, the sprite is actually named TRE1A0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR TreeStub { {{Property|Radius}} 15 {{Property|Height}} 80 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: TRET A -1 Stop } }
